greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 2^a(n) is the highest power of 2 dividing A000930(n).
comment: This is the 2-adic valuation of A000930.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
program: (MAGMA) A000930:=func<i | &+[Binomial(i-2*k,k): k in [0..i div 3]]>; [Valuation(A000930(n),2): n in [0..120]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Aug 05 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 04 2013
